main.name: Andre Peixoto
main.description: IT Coordinator and Developer by day, Parent and Husband by Night
main.bio: My name is Andre, I'm a JavaScript (React) and Flutter Developer.
main.biocomplement: I'm currently working as a remote Flutter developer for a Telemedicine Start-Up based in Sao Paulo/Brazil.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details and possibily discuss about any projects.

resume.skillmessage: These are some of my technical skills:

education.degree: Fullstack JavaScript (ReactJS, React Native, Node.js) Bootcamp

work.title: Flutter Developer
work.description: Working on a cross-platform (Android/iOS/web) Flutter app in a Telemedicine Start-up that aims to create a inclusive user-friendly App for connecting Patients and Doctors, while giving to the Patient ownership of all their medical data/history through our App.

work.title: IT Coordinator and Business Advisor
work.description: Conducts IT management, such as network and applications support, both in person and remotely. Develops Business consulting services, aiming greater ROI and customer satisfaction.

work.title: IT Coordinator
work.description: Coordinates media and communication ministry (sound operation, video streaming of courses and services, monthly newsletters editing, website's design and maintenance).

work.title: English Teacher
work.description: Worked as a C2-leve ESL Teacher helping teenagers and adults learn and master the English language.
